description: This tasty pasta relies on just a few store cupboard essentials to make a quick meal. Replace the pancetta with thinly sliced ham for a leaner cut of pork.
name: Pasta With Peas & Pancetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g dried shell pasta, such as conchigliette
50g Parmesan cheese, finely grated, plus extra for serving

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta in boiling salted water according to the packet instructions. A minute or two before the end of cooking, throw the peas in with the pasta to cook through. Drain (reserving a ladleful of the cooking water) and return it to the pan with the reserved water.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large frying pan. Cook the pancetta for 3-5 minutes over a medium heat until crispy. Add the garlic and cook for a further minute, then remove from the heat.
Toss the garlic pancetta through the pasta and peas, and follow with the Parmesan cheese. Season well to taste and serve with extra Parmesan cheese.
